msg.msgText:
A "QueueManagerConnection" composite object can be updated using the "update" option of the "imaserver" command.
SYNTAX: imaserver update QueueManagerConnection help imaserver update QueueManagerConnection "Name=value" "Item=value" ...
EXAMPLE: imaserver update QueueManagerConnection "Name=QMConn1" "ChannelName=CHANNEL2"
Configuration items for "QueueManagerConnection" object:

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command or an object help.
